RSSingleRESPXSec [Rein-Seghal] Model RES d^xsec / dQ^2 dW configuration.
The actual Rein-Seghal model is coded at ReinSeghalRESPXSec.
This algorithm decides which instance of the ReinSeghalRESPXSec algorithm to run depending on the initial state: 1) CC (n+p), 2) NC (n), 3) NC (p).
